name: regreso
title: Regreso
description: Create destinations for resources you want to return to later, manage maps, trunks, and tags.
author: regreso

commands.name: create-destination
commands.title: Create Destination
commands.description: Creates a new destination, which can be a URL or note.

preferences.name: ai-tagging
preferences.title: AI Tagging
preferences.description: Enable AI-tagging for new destinations using your LLM instance.

preferences.name: ai-instance
preferences.title: AI Instance URL
preferences.description: The URL of your LLM instance for AI-tagging

preferences.name: instance-url
preferences.title: Instance URL
preferences.description: The URL of your Regreso instance.

preferences.name: email
preferences.title: Email
preferences.description: The email for your Regreso account.

preferences.name: password
preferences.title: Password
preferences.description: The password for your Regreso account.

preferences.name: session-token
preferences.title: Session Token
preferences.description: The session token for your Regreso account. If you have a session token, you can use it instead of email and password.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
